entry.title: Awesome Flutter Updates on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2024
entry.content:
Websites / Blogs

  • Flutter Stack Weekly - Weekly newsletter on new development and updates curated by Jimmy Sanghani

UI / List

  • Liquid Pull To Refresh (‚≠ê1.3k) - A beautiful and custom refresh indicator by Ayush Agarwal.
  • Super List (‚≠ê363) - Drop-in replacement for SliverList and ListView that can handle large amount of items with variable extents by Matej Knopp
  • Reorderables (‚≠ê757) - Drag&Drop Table, Row, Column, Wrap(Grid) and SliverList elements by Hansheng Chiu.
  • Infinite Listview (‚≠ê303) - Infinite scroll in both directions by Simon Lightfoot.
  • PlutoGrid (‚≠ê715) - Web and desktop datagrid that can be controlled by the keyboard by bosskmk.
  • Typeahead (‚≠ê850) - Display overlay suggestions to users as they type by Abdul Rahman Al Hamali
  • Snaplist (‚≠ê456) - Create snappable list views by David Leibovych
  • StaggeredGridView (‚≠ê3.2k) - GridView with tiles of variable sizes by Romain Rastel

UI

  • Direct Select (‚≠ê800) - Selection widget with an ethereal, full-screen modal popup by Ivan Yatsouba.
  • Timeline Tile (‚≠ê776) - Tile to help build beautiful and customisable timelines by Julio Bitencourt.
  • Smooth Page Indicator (‚≠ê1.4k) - Customizable animated page indicator with a set of built-in effects. Milad Akarie

UI / UI Helpers

  • In View Notifier List (‚≠ê681) - ListView that notify when widgets are on screen within a provided area by Vamsi Krishna.
  • Mix (‚≠ê702) - An expressive way to effortlessly build design systems by Leo Farias.
  • Blurhash (‚≠ê551) - Compact representation of a placeholder for an image. Encode a blurry image under 30 caracters by Robert Felker

Storage / Preferences

  • Streaming Shared Preferences (‚≠ê248) - Reactive key-value store, shared preferences with Streams by Iiro Krankka

Device / Augmented Reality

  • VPN (‚≠ê367) - Access VPN services by Jason C.H
  • Geolocator (‚≠ê1.3k) - A Flutter geolocation plugin which provides easy access to the platform specific location services by Baseflow
  • Permission Handler (‚≠ê2.1k) - A Flutter permission plugin which provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API to request and check permissions by Baseflow
  • WidgetKit (‚≠ê264) - A plugins which allows you to create a Widget-Extention for iOS by Thomas Leiter
  • Live Activities (‚≠ê217) - A plugin to use iOS live activities & Dynamic Island features by Dimitri Dessus

State management / Standard

  • Get It (‚≠ê1.4k) - Simple direct Service Locator that allows to decouple the interface from a concrete implementation by Thomas Burkhartb
  • GetX (‚≠ê11k) - Contextless, State-management & navigation by Jonny Borges
  • MobX (‚≠ê2.4k) - Supercharge the state-management in your apps with Transparent Functional Reactive Programming (TFRP). Port of MobX from the Js/React land.
  • Signals (‚≠ê615) - Reactive programming made simple. Port of Signals pattern by Rody Davis

Game / Game Engine resources

  • Awesome Flame (‚≠ê1.2k) - Curated list of the best Flame games, projects, libraries, tools, tutorials, articles and more by Flame Engine

üá∫üá∏ United States / Misc

  • Meetup NYC
